description:
This is course is for those that wish to learn how to install Wordpress on an Amazon EC2 server. In the course you will learn how to install PHP5.5, MySQL 5.5 and Apache 2.4 via the command line, using the yum package manager.

There's 5 video lectures, as well as quizzes along the way to ensure you've understand. It should only take 30 minutes to watch the whole course, but to fully understand and to get yourself up and running it may take you longer.

If you're just starting out and would like to learn about Amazon Web Services, and would love to be able to install PHP & MySQL yourself then you should definitely look into this course!
title: Installing & Configuring Wordpress in Amazon EC2
